sentences.en: "Wait a damn minute," Mindy spat. "Nobody said anything about staying overnight."
sentences.cn: “该死的，等一下”，明迪愤愤地说道，“谁也没说过要过夜。”

sentences.en: "What would you like to eat?" — "Anything'll do me, Eva."
sentences.cn: “你想吃什么？”——“我吃什么都行，伊娃。”

sentences.en: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.cn: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.en: Did you learn anything in your day, as a student?
sentences.cn: 你在学生时代学到什么东西了吗？

sentences.en: Do not hesitate to laugh at anything you find amusing.
sentences.cn: 只要觉得好笑就尽管笑。

sentences.en: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.cn: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.en: I can't think of anything in my life that's going right.
sentences.cn: 我想不起我的生活中有任何一帆风顺的事情。

sentences.en: I was anything but happy about going.
sentences.cn: 我根本不喜欢去

sentences.en: it doesn't taste anything like wine.
sentences.cn: 这尝起来根本不像酒。

sentences.en: It's unlikely that you'll be asked to do anything too taxing.
sentences.cn: 不大可能叫你做什么太费劲的事儿。

sentences.en: Let's fingerprint the canoe, see if we come up with anything.
sentences.cn: 让我们提取一下独木舟上的指纹，看看能不能有什么发现。

sentences.en: no strings attached, you don't have to join up or anything.
sentences.cn: 又没什么条件，你没必要入伍或是其他什么的。

sentences.en: People will work themselves up into a state about anything.
sentences.cn: 人们总会沉不住气，为任何事感到担忧。

sentences.en: she said it out loud, clear as anything.
sentences.cn: 她高声把话说出来，再清楚不过了。

sentences.en: she said it out loud, clear as anything.
sentences.cn: 她高声把话说出来，再清楚不过了。

sentences.en: she said it out loud, clear as anything.
sentences.cn: 她高声把话说出来，再清楚不过了。

sentences.en: She seemed to be unable to rouse herself to do anything.
sentences.cn: 她似乎打不起精神去做任何事情。

sentences.en: She'd do anything for a bit of pin money.
sentences.cn: 为了挣点外快，她什么都肯做。

sentences.en: The gestation period can be anything between 95 and 150 days.
sentences.cn: 妊娠期从95天至150天不等。

sentences.en: This is such an unforeseeable situation that anything could happen.
sentences.cn: 这种情况很难预测，什么事都有可能发生。

sentences.en: We didn't"fix" anything. It'll be seen as it happens.
sentences.cn: 我们没做任何手脚，该什么样就会什么样。

sentences.en: Within criminal law almost anything could be defined as "crime".
sentences.cn: 在刑法中，几乎任何行为都可以被界定为“犯罪”。

sentences.en: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.cn: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.en: You can write about swimming, skiing, or anything else you enjoy doing.
sentences.cn: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

sentences.en: You need hard currency to get anything halfway decent.
sentences.cn: 你得有硬通货才能买到还算不错的东西。

phrases.tran_cn: 怎么都行；任何事情都可能发生
（用于疑问或条件句）多多少少；一点…的味儿；很少
无论如何（用于否定句中）
胜任各项工作；对一切都适用
或者其他别的事，或其他什么的
(非正式)或其他什么的（补充与前面提到的事物相似的事物）
[委婉语](女子)见潮红，来例假[系“有喜了”的委婉说法]

trans.tran_en: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

trans.tran_cn: 任何事物/事情，…的东西/事情
trans.tran_en: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which
